name: Push Box Microban
description:
Push Box Microban is a remake of a classic computer puzzle game from Japan in which a player must push boxes in a maze called Sokoban.

You have to push crates to their proper locations with a minimum number of moves. The puzzle is solved when all crates are pushed into the right places. The boxes can only be pushed, never pulled, so you have to be careful not to push them into a corner where you can't get them out again. You can only push one crate at the time.

If you made a wrong move, you can return it with the "undo last move" button.
If you don't know what to do, you can use the help and get the level solved (the button with the picture of the light bulb).

Push Box Microban features:
250+ challenging levels
Beautiful 3D environment
Undo moves using the back button
Show level solution
No in-app purchases
No ads

Puzzle Packs:
Microban - Author: David W. Skinner
Microban II - Author: David W. Skinner

Language: English

Music by Eric Matyas
www.soundimage.org
